TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Qatu, title = Qatu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qatu} }

S.FORM: == Qatu == u sulit nu Hulam 卡度部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Nantou a kuwan ku niyazu' nu Qatu. u kasalumaluma' nu Qatu sa, 306 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 1,166 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 1,075 ku tademaw, pakalatu 92%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 91 ku tademaw, pakalatu 8%. u asip nu cidekay a tademaw u kasabinacadan, Yuwatan(Bunun) 89%, Pangcha(Amis) 1%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Sejek(Seediq) 1%. u niyazu' nu Yuwatan(Bunun) u niyazu' nu Yuwatan(Bunun) kuyni, katuud ku Yuwatan(Bunun) itini mueneng. u zuma a tademaw sa u Tayan, u Pangcah atu Sejek. inayi' tu ku zuma cidekay a tademaw mueneng itini. u Sakizaya a tademaw inay' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bulad . tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bulad pulung sausi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yuwatan (58,465), Rukay (13,319), Puyuma (14,170), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taluku (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laaluwa (401), Kanakanabu (335), zuma (11,985)

== Qato == o solit no Holam 卡度部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Nantoo a kowan ko niyazo' no Qato. o kasalomaloma' no Qato sa, 306 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 1,166 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 1,075 ko tademaw, pakalato 92%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 91 ko tademaw, pakalato 8%. o asip no cidekay a tademaw o kasabinacadan, Yowatan(Bonon) 89%, Pangcha(Amis) 1%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Sejek(Seediq) 1%. o niyazo' no Yowatan(Bonon) o niyazo' no Yowatan(Bonon) koyni, katood ko Yowatan(Bonon) itini moeneng. o zoma a tademaw sa o Tayan, o Pangcah ato Sejek. inayi' to ko zoma cidekay a tademaw moeneng itini. o Sakizaya a tademaw inay' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bolad . tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bolad polong saosi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yowatan (58,465), Rokay (13,319), Poyoma (14,170), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taloko (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laalowa (401), Kanakanabo (335), zoma (11,985)
